name: Santa's Rampage (Miguel Rico)
description:
Dear kids of the world:

You better watch out, you better not cry

I'm gonna find out who's naughty or nice

If you're not written on my Naughty List

Under the Christmas tree you'll have a gift

But if you've been naughty you better run

Or else I'll kill you with my coal gun

Ho ho ho! Merry Christmas!

-Santa

Santa's Rampage is a Christmas themed top-down shooter where you play as Santa, and you have to kill all the naughty kids in your list. Kill them before they grab a present from the Christmas tree and escape, and don't hurt the good kids.

WASD to move, mouse to aim, left click to shoot, E to show the List.

Have fun!

A game by Alejandro Villalba & Miguel Rico. All rights reserved.
